titles.title: A resolution congratulating the United States Women's National Soccer Team on winning the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup.
A resolution congratulating the United States Women's National Soccer Team on winning the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the U.S. Women's National Soccer Team for winning an unprecedented four Women's World Cup titles and for inspiring a new generation of youth to strive for physical greatness and athletic achievement.
